task.title: Roll back changes using a snapshot
task.shortdesc: When necessary, you can use a snapshot to roll back to a previous version of your set-up without changing the underlying cluster infrastructure.

step.cmd: In the upper navigation bar of the UI, click Snapshots > Full Snapshots (Instance).

Select the snapshot you wish to roll back to from the list of available snapshots and click Restore from this backup
Cycle icon .
Follow the instructions to complete either a partial restore or a full restore.
step.info: A full restore is useful if you need to stay on an earlier version of an application and want to disable automatic version updates. Otherwise, a partial restore is the quicker option.
